response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product is truly exceptional, and we believe it's worth every penny. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $14,000 for this item. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring we receive a fair return for our efforts and investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. We're confident you'll find the product to be an excellent addition to your collection or operations.", "product_price": 14000}
